name: Ancient Warriors Saga - A Man's Honor
text: If an "Ancient Warriors" monster(s) would be destroyed by battle, you can send this card to the GY instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ancient Warriors Saga - A Man's Honor" once per turn. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can Special Summon 1 "Ancient Warriors Dragoon Token" (Beast-Warrior/WIND/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500). When a card or effect is activated that targets an "Ancient Warriors" monster(s) on the field: You can banish this card from your GY; negate the activation.
